person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Switzerland stands accused by Senator Alfonse D'Amato , chairman of the powerful U.S. Senate Banking Committee , of agreeing to give money to Poland from unclaimed bank accounts of Polish citizens , as part of an accord on compensating Swiss nationals whose assets had been seized in communist Poland .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| Senator Alfonse D'Amato |
| Chairman of the U.S. Senate Banking Committee |
| Polish citizens |
| Swiss nationals |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with only the entities that clearly refer to "Person":

| Person |
| --- |
| Senator Alfonse D'Amato |
| Polish citizens |

I removed "U.S. Senate Banking Committee" and "Swiss nationals" as they are not referring to specific individuals, but rather organizations or groups of people.
